Name: Striking Parts I
Des: Deal 1000 DMG to a boss's part

Name: Striking Parts II
Des: Deal 3000 DMG to a boss's part

Name: Striking Parts III
Des: Deal 5000 DMG to a boss's part

Name: Final Blow
Des: Inflict the final blow on the boss

Name: Team Carries
Des: The rest of your teammates clear the stage after you die

Name: Tough Victory I
Des: Clear a stage with less than 1% HP

Name: Tough Victory II
Des: Clear a stage with less than 5% HP

Name: Tough Victory III
Des: Clear a stage with less than 10% HP
